titleStmt.title: A sharp, but short noise of warr, or, The ruine of Antichrist by the sword of temporall warr, hinted. Written, by Francis Lin,
titleStmt.author: Line, Francis, 1595-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons, next doore to the Golden Lyon in Aldersgate-Streete,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy E.595[2]: "1649 Mar. 12"; Annotation on Thomason copy E.622[2]: "Jan. 21".
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
